rows.label: qst660106_msg0001
rows.name:
Shulk, Fiorung...
There something I have to give you.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0002
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: qst660106_msg0003
rows.name: Look.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0004
rows.name: Some kind of funny-looking ring...?

rows.label: qst660106_msg0005
rows.name:
Strange it may look, yes, but it is
extremely valuable.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0006
rows.name:
It called Alst Linkring. Archrare
treasure of Nopon Archsage.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0007
rows.name:
If friends have this, friends
can travel to world of Alst.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0008
rows.name:
That's crazy. I never knew something
like that even existed.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0009
rows.name:
You could've given it to us a lot
sooner, you know.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0010
rows.name:
I never thought friends could
make it this far. That is reason.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0011
rows.name:
But friends showed something special.
That deserve very special reward.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0012
rows.name: I guess that makes sense.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0013
rows.name: Thank you, then.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0014
rows.name: Come! Friends try on now.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0015
rows.name: Whoa... This is incredible!

rows.label: qst660106_msg0016
rows.name:
I can see the portal that Rex and
the others came through!

rows.label: qst660106_msg0017
rows.name:
That means you'll be able to go
back to Alst with us!

rows.label: qst660106_msg0018
rows.name: Nice one!

rows.label: qst660106_msg0019
rows.name: However. There is special condition.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0020
rows.name: Oh, yeah?

rows.label: qst660106_msg0021
rows.name:
It is not bodies of Shulk and Fiorung
that will travel to Alst...

rows.label: qst660106_msg0022
rows.name: Only their spirits.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0023
rows.name: Come again? How does that work...?

rows.label: qst660106_msg0024
rows.name: It like a ghost thing.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0025
rows.name:
Friends be on Alst, but not actually
exist there. In actuality, friends will
remain right here.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0026
rows.name:
But we'll still be able to explore
the world that Rex comes from?

rows.label: qst660106_msg0027
rows.name: Very much so.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0028
rows.name:
Friends able to see, eat, fight,
speak... Can do most things
just like normal.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0029
rows.name:
That sounds brilliant!
Where do I sign?

rows.label: qst660106_msg0030
rows.name:
Yeah... I'm curious to experience
that for myself.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0031
rows.name: I very happy that friends happy.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0032
rows.name:
I, Nopon Archsage, spend thousand
years finding Alst Linkring, so please
not to drop in toilet accidentally.

rows.label: qst660106_msg0033
rows.name:
Shulk, Rex, it seems like maybe it'd
be quickest to just try for ourselves.
Shall we get going?

rows.label: qst660106_msg0034
rows.name: Yeah, I reckon you might be right...

rows.label: qst660106_msg0037
rows.name: Let's go then!
